description: This PHP source file is part of a web-based troubleshooting interface displaying MoCA network diagnostics, including device info, network topology, and statistics. It integrates PHP, JavaScript, and HTML to present real-time network data.

methods.name: div_mod
methods.description: A function to compute the quotient and remainder of division, used for time formatting.

methods.name: init_psmMode
methods.description: Initializes page state, likely setting up UI elements and navigation (as called in JavaScript).

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Fetches MoCA interface values from the device, returning an associative array of parameters.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values for specified object and attribute mappings.
